level_1.skillDescription:
Summons a pillar of light centered on you
Continuously applies Light elemental damage to enemies within the skill's range

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 2nd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the skill power and rate of elemental charge accumulation

level_3.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 3rd stage
Charging to higher stages increases the skill power and rate of elemental charge accumulation

abilities.skillDescription: Increases the rate of Light elemental charge accumulation
Reduces the duration of the Light pillars and increases hit count
